p: The survival assay of the correlated genes shows similar significance to that of the COL11A1 gene in the colon adenocarcinoma dataset. The KM-plot obtained for overall survival at higher expression of THBS2 ( p-value- 0.021), COL10A1 ( p-value- 0.129), COL5A2 ( p-value- 0.714), and COL1A2 ( p-value- 0.221) is related with lower survival probability ( Figures 3D–G). Similarly, the disease-specific survival is also decrease with the increase in expression of THBS2 ( p-value- 0.015), COL10A1 ( p-value- 0.126), COL5A2 ( p-value- 0.925), and COL1A2 ( p-value- 0.602) ( Figures 3H–K).
